name: Shuriken Master!
description:
Shuriken Master! is a unique arcade game, combining two famous gameplays - breaking blocks and planetary defense - to create a whole new gaming experience that fit your daily busy routine.

You will play as Tofo, a ninja-to-be white owl and also a food shop owner, using his outstanding sharpshooter skill and mighty katana to defend himself from waves of evil foods that trying to crush him.

FRESH GAMEPLAY
- Throw Shurikens to defend yourself from hordes of evil Sushi!
- Analyze the battlefield to prioritize your target.
- Choose the best angle to shoot.
- 5+ Enemies with special abilities to test your dexterity and strategic thinking skill!

CUSTOMIZABLE OUTFITS WITH POWERS
- Different abilities with 5 badass Masks.
- Unleash frenzied power of 5 legendary Katanas
- A huge collection of Shurikens in all shapes and sizes.
- Each equipped item will change the look of Tofo, in game!

COOL GRAPHIC
- Badass but cute Tofo, the white owl ninja!
- Evil but adorable sushi enemies!
- Spectacular action moments!
